001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DurationSupport;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.Path;
007import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
008import java.time.Duration;
009import java.time.LocalDateTime;
010import java.time.ZoneOffset;
011import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.util.Queue;
014import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
015
016/** A logbook collects notes, prints them, and is able to write itself into a file. */
017public class Logbook {
018
019  /** An interface declaring default methods operating on an instance of {@code Logbook}. */
020  public interface Trait {
021    Logbook logbook();
022
023    default void log(String message) {
024      log(Level.DEBUG, message);
025    }
026
027    default void log(Level level, String text) {
028      logbook().logMessage(level, text);
029    }
030
031    default <T extends Throwable> T log(T throwable) {
032      return log(throwable instanceof Error ? Level.ERROR : Level.WARNING, throwable);
033    }
034
035    default <T extends Throwable> T log(Level level, T throwable) {
036      log(level, throwable.toString());
037      return throwable;
038    }
039
040    default void logCaption(String line) {
041      logbook().logCaption(line);
042    }
043
044    default void logMessage(String info) {
045      log(Level.INFO, info);
046    }
047  }
048
049  /** An abstract logbook entry. */
050  public sealed interface Note permits CaptionNote, MessageNote, ToolCallNote, ToolRunNote {}
051
052  /** A textual note starting a section of notes. */
053  public record CaptionNote(String line) implements Note {}
054
055  /** A weighted textual note. */
056  public record MessageNote(Level level, String text) implements Note {}
057
058  /** A note indicating that a tool is about to be called. */
059  public record ToolCallNote(ToolCall call) implements Note {}
060
061  /** A note indicating that a tool was run with a detailed description. */
062  public record ToolRunNote(ToolRun run, String description) implements Note {}
063
064  private final Bach bach;
065  private final Printer printer;
066  private final Queue<Note> notes;
067  private final LocalDateTime start;
068  private final String timestamp;
069
070  public Logbook(Bach bach) {
071    this.bach = bach;
072    this.printer = bach.printer();
073    this.notes = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
074    this.start = LocalDateTime.now(ZoneOffset.UTC);
075    this.timestamp = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(Configuration.TIMESTAMP_PATTERN).format(start);
076  }
077
078  public Duration uptime() {
079    return Duration.between(start, LocalDateTime.now(ZoneOffset.UTC));
080  }
081
082  private <N extends Note> N add(N note) {
083    notes.add(note);
084    return note;
085  }
086
087  public void logCaption(String line) {
088    print(add(new CaptionNote(line)));
089  }
090
091  public void logMessage(Level level, String text) {
092    print(add(new MessageNote(level, text)));
093  }
094
095  void logToolCall(ToolCall call) {
096    print(add(new ToolCallNote(call)));
097  }
098
099  void logToolRun(ToolRun run, String description) {
100    print(add(new ToolRunNote(run, description)));
101  }
102
103  protected void print(CaptionNote note) {
104    bach.out().println();
105    bach.out().println(note.line());
106  }
107
108  protected void print(MessageNote note) {
109    var severity = note.level().getSeverity();
110    var text = note.text();
111    if (severity >= Level.ERROR.getSeverity()) {
112      bach.err().println(text);
113      return;
114    }
115    if (severity >= Level.WARNING.getSeverity()) {
116      bach.out().println(text);
117      return;
118    }
119    if (severity >= Level.INFO.getSeverity() || bach.configuration().verbose()) {
120      bach.out().println(text);
121    }
122  }
123
124  protected void print(ToolCallNote note) {
125    var builder = new StringBuilder("%16s".formatted(note.call().name()));
126    for (var argument : note.call().arguments()) {
127      builder.append(" ").append(String.join("\\n", argument.lines().toList()));
128    }
129    var string = builder.toString();
130    var line = string.length() <= 111 ? string : string.substring(0, 111 - 3) + "...";
131    bach.out().println(line);
132  }
133
134  protected void print(ToolRunNote note) {
135    var run = note.run();
136    if (run.isError() || bach.configuration().verbose()) printer.print(run);
137  }
138
139  public void print(ToolRun run) {
140    if (run.isError() || bach.configuration().verbose()) return;
141    printer.print(run);
142  }
143
144  public String toMarkdown() {
145    var md = new ArrayList<String>();
146    md.add("# Bach Logbook");
147    md.add("");
148    md.add("- start: " + start);
149    md.add("");
150    md.add("## Notes");
151    md.add("");
152    for (var note : notes) {
153      if (note instanceof CaptionNote caption) {
154        md.add("");
155        md.add("**" + sanitize(caption.line()) + "**");
156        md.add("");
157        continue;
158      }
159      if (note instanceof MessageNote message) {
160        md.add("- [%s] %s".formatted(message.level().name(), sanitize(message.text())));
161        continue;
162      }
163      if (note instanceof ToolRunNote ran) {
164        var run = ran.run();
165        var thread = run.thread() == 1 ? "main" : "0x%x".formatted(run.thread());
166        var duration = DurationSupport.toHumanReadableString(run.duration());
167        md.add(
168            """
169
170            <details>
171            <summary>%s (%s):<code>%s</code></summary>
172            """
173                .formatted(duration, thread, run.name().strip()));
174        var command = run.name() + ' ' + String.join(" ", run.args());
175        md.add("> - `%s`".formatted(command.stripTrailing()));
176        md.add("> - executed by = " + ran.description());
177        md.add("> - executed in thread = " + run.thread());
178        md.add("> - exit code = " + run.code());
179        md.add("> - duration = " + duration);
180        if (!run.output().isEmpty()) {
181          md.add("> ");
182          md.add("> ```text");
183          run.output().lines().map(line -> "> " + sanitize(line)).forEach(md::add);
184          md.add("> ```");
185        }
186        if (!run.errors().isEmpty()) {
187          md.add("");
188          md.add("```text");
189          run.errors().lines().map(line -> "> " + sanitize(line)).forEach(md::add);
190          md.add("```");
191        }
192        md.add("""
193
194          </details>
195          """);
196        continue;
197      }
198      md.add("- `" + sanitize(note) + "`");
199    }
200    md.add(
201        """
202
203        ## Thanks for using Bach
204
205        Support its development at <https://github.com/sponsors/sormuras>
206        """);
207    return String.join("\n", md);
208  }
209
210  Path write(Path directory) throws Exception {
211    var logbookFile = directory.resolve(Configuration.LOGBOOK_MARKDOWN_FILE);
212    var archiveName = Configuration.LOGBOOK_ARCHIVE_FILE.replace("{TIMESTAMP}", timestamp);
213    var archiveFile = directory.resolve(archiveName);
214    Files.createDirectories(logbookFile.getParent());
215    Files.writeString(logbookFile, toMarkdown());
216    Files.createDirectories(archiveFile.getParent());
217    Files.copy(logbookFile, archiveFile, StandardCopyOption.COPY_ATTRIBUTES);
218    return logbookFile;
219  }
220
221  public static String sanitize(Object object) {
222    return object.toString().replace('\t', ' ').replaceAll("\\e\\[[\\d;]*[^\\d;]", "");
223  }
224}
